divs: sighting detailsmy dogs awaken me first at 4:30am on sunday 12\28\09. i let them outside and they came back in. i went back to bed 5 mins. later. my one dog awaken me again at 5:45am. as i was getting out of bed i glanced out the bedroom window and saw a bright red light in the sky. i walked over to the window and opened it to get a clearer view and to listen for a sound. in doing so i heard a very low hum that went from high to low. that morning you could hear a pin drop. living in the woods is extremely quite during the winter and sunday morning 12\27\09 was a cold crisp, no clouds, star lit sky no wind morning. it was completely still. the object was actually just above the tops of the trees and about a 1\2 football field away. it was quite larger. it was hard to define the actually shape and size. when i first spotted it there what appears to be 3 prongs or legs hanging down from it covered in red, blue green, yellow - amber lights. i awaken my friend to come and take a look. as he was watching this object i was trying to find my i phone to no avail. i flickered the outside lights on and off. he stated as i did that the white light underneath the object changed to a blue green. the object appeared to be square to him with lights at each corner and a light in the middle. he stated that middle light shot a beam down but it didn't reach the ground when i was flickering the outside lights on and off. i quickly got dressed and jump in my car to follow it since it moving very slowly. it actually look as if it was gliding more so than being propelled. as i got to a clearing at the end of the road the object had already appeared to be about 2 miles away on the other side of the hill side. i turned around and went back home. as i got out of the car another object flew directly over my house heading in the same path as the previous object. i was able to see that it had a red light on each end of the span and a white light in the center. this object was about 2000' feet up it was larger. i listened for a sound and determine it was a plane. a plane has never flown directly over my house especially at the low of a altitude.
trends: there have been no other sightings in pigeon hills\ spring grov
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: UFO , was not a plane or ballon or helicopter that I'm sure of...
